mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( PROD_NO , PROD_NAME, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, PRICE, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval , #{ prodName} , #{ prodDetail} , #{ manuDate} , #{ price} , #{ fileName} , sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, price, manufacture_day, image_file, reg_date from product WHERE prod_no = ${value}

SELECT prod_no, prod_name, price, prod_detail, tran_status_code, image_file, row_seq FROM ( SELECT inner_table.prod_no, inner_table.prod_name, inner_table.price, inner_table.prod_detail,inner_table.tran_status_code,inner_table.image_file, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, p.prod_detail, t.tran_status_code, p.image_file FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no = t.tran_no(+)
AND prod_name LIKE #{searchKeyword}%
AND price LIKE #{searchKeyword}%
ORDER BY prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
